history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER public transit
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?For example, you can say I'm going to Murray and Forbes
USER I'm going to Children's Hospital.
TTS Okay, going to upmc children's hospital of pittsburgh. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 01:43 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 29 minutes, and you will take 2 busses. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes next step.

TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 7 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Fifth avenue + Craig Streetnear side. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes next step.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 75 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Ellsworth avenue + Negley.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 1:54pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yeah, I'm ready.
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Move on.

TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 64 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Penn avenue + 44th . .</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 2:06pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER Yes next step.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
